661:1: atha bhagavāṃ śākyamuniḥ punarapi śuddhāvāsabhavanamavalokya tatrasthāṃśca devasaṅghāṃ sarvāṃśca buddhabodhisattvā pratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṃ punarapi mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
661:2: nirdiṣṭo'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvasvabhūtaṃ dharmakośaṃ cintāmaṇipratiprakhyaṃ lokānāmāśayasaphalīkaraṇārthaṃ tasmiṃ kāle yugādhame śūnye buddhakṣetre parinirvṛtānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saddharmanetrī antarddhānakālasamaye tasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ samaye sarvatathāgatānāṃ mantrakośasaṃrakṣanārthaṃ tvadīyakumāramantratantrāṇāṃ kalparāje'smiṃ nidhānabhūto bhaviṣyati |
661:3: japyamāno vidhinā sārabhūto'yaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ! sarvatathāgatamantratantrāṇāṃ tvadīye ca kumārakalparāje'grabhūto bhaviṣyatyayaṃ ekākṣaracakravarttī |
661:4: anena japyamānena sarve tāthāgatā vidyārājānaḥ japtā bhavanti ||
661:5: aparamapi mañjuśrīḥ ! tvadīyakalparāje nidhānabhūtaṃ sārabhūtaṃ agrabhūtaṃ jyeṣṭhabhūtamekākṣaraṃ pūrvamāsīt |
661:6: atīte kāle atīte samaye dvāṣaṣṭigaṅgānadīsikataprakhyaiḥ kalpaiḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendro nāma tathāgato'rhan samyak sambuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavāṃ |
661:7: yasya smaraṇādeva nāmagrahaṇamātreṇa pañcānantaryāṇi kṣayaṃ gacchanti |
661:8: niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇā bahavaḥ sattvāḥ ye nāmamātraṃ śroṣyante |
661:10: avaśyaṃ ca sarvamantrajāpibhiḥ ayaṃ bhagavānamitāyurjñānaviniścayarājā tathāgataḥ prathamata eva manasi karttavyaḥ |
661:11: vācā ca vaktavyā - namastasmai bhagavate amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrāya tathāgatāyārhate samyak sambuddhāya||
661:12: tato'mitābhaṃ ratnaketuṃ tataḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā yathepsitaṃ mantrā japtavyā |
661:14: yat kāraṇaṃ mahāpuṇyābhivṛddhaye mantrāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saṃjñāparikīrttanaṃ namaskāraṃ ca sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo'yaṃ kuśalasambhāraparipūrito bhavati |
661:16: mantrā ca tasya āśu siddhiṃ prayacchanti|
661:17: amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena ayamekākṣaramantraḥ sarvatathāgatahṛdayaḥ sarvamantratantrābhimataḥ sarvakarmāsādhakaḥ mañjughoṣa ! tvadīye kalparāje paramarahasyaṃ paramaguhyatamaṃ lokenātmahitāya prayoktavyam |
661:23: na tasya deyaṃ mantraṃ vai siddhistasya na dṛśyate |
661:30: ṣaṭsaptatyaḥ tathā koṭyaḥ purā gītaṃ svayambhunā ||
661:39: sāṣṭaṃ karmasahasraṃ ca kurute ca dhruvaṃ tathā |
661:45: ta imaṃ yugāntake loke śāstariḥ parinirvṛte |
661:46: siddhiṃ ca yāsyate kṣipraṃ vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā ||
661:52: sa dadyuḥ mantravaraṃ mukhyaṃ buddhaputrasya dhīmate ||
661:62: eṣa saḥ mārṣā ! amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendreṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyak sambuddhena bhāṣitam |
661:63: amitavyūhavatyāṃ lokadhātau sthitena sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janasyārthāya anāgatānāṃ ca janatāmavekṣya śāsanāntarddhānakālasamayaṃ viditvāṃ ante yugādhame ratnatrayāpakāriṇāṃ duṣṭarājñāṃ nivāraṇārthaṃ jyeṣṭhamaurasaṃ putraṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ mahāsthāmaprāptāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dattavāṃ |
661:65: samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya dattavāṃ |
661:66: tato mañjuśriyeṇa kumārabhūtena sarvasattvānāmanugrahārthaṃ mahākaruṇāvaśena hṛdayasthaḥ svamūrttau sthāpitavāṃ |
661:67: anāgatakālamavekṣya yugādhame śāsanāntarddhānakālasamaye ahamapaścimakastathāgataḥ duṣṭe kāle kalau yuge mama śāsanasaṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ kariṣyatyayaṃ mantravaraḥ ||
661:69: śṛṇu kumāra ! mañjusvara ! susvara ! tavaitanmāhātmyaṃ kalpavistaram |
661:73: kṣīrāhāreṇa mauninā nānyatra mantragatacittena tṛśaraṇaparigṛhītena utpāditabodhicittena ca moṣadhaśīlasaṃvarasamādāpanābodhisattvasaṃvarasaṃvaraparigṛhītena japtavyam |
661:76: upoṣadhikena citrakareṇa aśleṣakairvarṇaiḥ anyatareṇa śucinā celakhaṇḍena paṭṭake vā candanakarpūrakuṅkumaparyuṣitena śucau deśe śucinā citrakareṇa triśuklabhojinā śucivastraprāvṛtena ādityodayakālaparipūrṇapañcadaśyāṃ viśuddhanakṣatreṇa likhāpayitavyaṃ yāvanmadhyāhnam |
661:78: evaṃ divase divase yāvat parisamāpta iti ||
661:80: hastamātre paṭe sugatavitasticaturasre paṭṭake vā samantādamitāyurvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ samantāt padmarāgendranīlasphaṭikamarakataparvatairadhastāt upaśobhitaṃ upariṣṭācca teṣāṃ mahāratnavimānopaśobhitākāraṃ dhvajapatākopaśobhitocchritākāraṃ tatra madhye ratnasiṃhāsanopaviṣṭamamitāyuviniścayarājendraṃ tathāgataṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ samantaprabhājvālāmālinaṃ īṣadraktāvadātaṃ vāmapārśvaratnopalaniṣaṇṇaṃ mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ cāmaravyagrahastaṃ tathāgatadṛṣṭiṃ vāmahastabījapūrṇakaphalanyastaṃ priyaṅguśyāmāvadātaṃ sarvālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaśarīraṃ samantajvālaṃ dakṣiṇapārśve bhagavantaṃ samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ratnopalasthitaṃ cāmaravyagrahastaṃ uddhūyamānasitavinyastapāṇiṃ vāmahastena ratnapāṇisarvālaṅkāraratnamakuṭavicchuritapriyaṅguśyāmāvadātaṃ nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivastaṃ muktikāhāraratnayajñopavītaṃ samantajvālāmālāvabaddhaṃ tasya dakṣiṇapārśve āryamañjuśriyaṃ ratnopalasthitakaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ pañcacīrakopaśobhitaṃ śiraṃ bāladārakālaṅkārālaṅkṛtaṃ kanakavarṇaṃ nīlapaṭṭacalanikānivastaṃ muktāvalīratnavyatimiśraṃ yajñopavītaṃ tathāgatadṛṣṭiṃ īṣatprahasitavadanaṃ saumyākāraṃ cārurūpaṃ kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ sarvākāravaropetaṃ likhāpayitavyam |
661:81: tasyādhastād yathā ce liṅgaṃ veṣī saṃsthānadhārī sādhakaḥ padmamālāṃ gṛhya jānukorparasaṃsthitaḥ avanataśiraḥ paṭakoṇāntadeśe likhāpayitavyaḥ |
661:84: vāmapārśve upariṣṭād dvau tathāgatau abhilikhāpayitavyau sālendrarājā ratnaketuśca |
661:85: samantaprabhā samantajvālā kanakavarṇāḥ sarvākāravaropetā sarvapuṣpābhikīrṇā niṣaṇṇā padmāsaneṣveva nānyāsaneṣu dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ paryaṅkopaviṣṭāḥ saumyākārā bhagavataḥ upariṣṭāt puṣpa varṣaṃ pravarṣayamānaṃ meghāntargatalīnaṃ tathāgatavigrahamutpatamānaṃ sunetranāmā abhilikhāpayitavyaḥ |
661:86: sarvākāravaropetaṃ samantaprabhājvālāmālinaṃ dakṣiṇahastena varapradaṃ vāmahastena cīvarakarṇakāvasaktam ||
661:87: etad bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya paṭavidhānam |
661:91: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvatathāgatoṣṇīṣarājānaṃ mahācakravartinamekākṣarasya ca yāni kalpavistarāṇi uktāni tāni sarvāṇi karoti |
661:96: manasā yadabhirucitaṃ asya paṭasya darśanādeva niyataṃ bodhiparāyaṇo bhavati ||
661:97: tasyaiva bhagavataḥ amitāyurjñānaviniścayarājendrasyādhiṣṭhānena sarvatathāgatahṛdaya ityucyate sarvatathāgata uṣṇīṣarājamityucyate |
661:105: asādhito'pi akṛtapuraścaraṇo'pi sarvagṛhārambhapratiṣṭhito'pi sarvabhakṣamadyamāṃsagrāmyadharmapratiṣeviṇo'pi varjayitvā aśrāddhasya anutpāditabodhicittasya |
661:120: varjayitvā tu svecchayā tadaha eva rātryāmeko yadi rocate dine dine kartavyaḥ |
661:121: atha na rocate bhasma saptābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā nābhideśaṃ spṛśet |
661:123: pañcajapto buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dhyātvā yaṃ spṛśet sa vaśyo bhavati |
661:124: candramasagrahe śaśigrahe śaśimaṇḍale arkakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya vināpi paṭena pūrvābhimukhaḥ ājyāhutīnāṃ daśasahasrāṇi juhuyāt |
661:125: rājakulasamīpe nimnagānāntarite devāvasathe vā nāntaritaṃ yasmiṃ deśe rājā tiṣṭhati tatra samīpe homakarmaḥ prayoktavyaḥ |
661:128: yadā na paśyate tadā tasya cittaṃ nyastaṃ bhavati |
661:135: etat karma śrāddhānāṃ ratnatrayaprasannānāṃ utpāditabodhicittānāṃ na kartavyam |
661:138: duṣṭacittānāṃ raudracittānāṃ dinedine darśanaṃ ca dātavyam |
661:140: yadi na bhavanti mahatā arthena viyujyante |
661:144: prabhāte deśasvāmī rājā bhavati mantrāpayati mantritavyam |
661:148: yadi sarvayāmikaṃ rātriṃ juhoti māsenekena labhate |
661:149: yadi māsaṃ juhoti rātryāṃ rātryāṃ viṣayaṃ pratilabhate |
661:150: viṣayapratitulyaṃ vā grāmaṃ anyaṃ vā yat kiñcid vitam |
661:153: candragrahe apāmārgakāṣṭhairagniṃ prajvālya palāśasamidhānāṃ brāhmaṇāre dadhimadhughṛtāktānāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ juhuyāt |
661:155: prabhāte saumyā brāhmaṇā rājā vidviṣṭo bhavati ||
661:158: homānte ca yasyāṃ diśi prabhustiṣṭhati tasyāṃ diśi tad bhasma kṣipet |
661:160: yaṃ vā taṃ vā yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā kāle rocate bhogāṃ vistarataiḥ sāhāyyatāṃ ca pratipadyate |
661:161: svalpamalpaṃ vā mahāntaṃ vā grāmamanuprayacchati viṣayaṃ vā |
661:163: atha kruddhacittaścaturvarṇyo anyataraṃ vikṛtasthāne vā yāto vikṛṣṭapradhānaliṅgena vā anyadevatābhaktaṃ laukikeṣu yasmiṃ diśi te tiṣṭhanti tadeva veśma so'sya deśāntaraṃ prakramate |
661:170: candragrahe tenaiva vidhinā buddhabodhisattvapratimāpaṭasya vā saddharmapustake vā sadhātukagarbhacaitye vā śucinā śucivastraprāvṛtena ahorātroṣitena niṣprāṇakenodakena karma karttavyam |
661:171: śuṣkapuṣpaiḥ sugandhaiḥ candanakuṅkumaparipūrṇaḥ karpūradhūpadhūpitoddeśaṃ taṃ kuryāt |
661:172: yatra karma prayujyate brāhmaṇāreḥ palāśakāṣṭhaiḥ kṣatriyāre aśvatthakāṣṭhaiḥ vaiśyāreḥ khadirakāṣṭhaiḥ śūdrārestadanyaiḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ agniṃ prajvālya tadeva karma kuryāt |
661:173: brāhmaṇasya palāśasamidha kṣatriyasyāśvatthasamidhaṃ vaiśyasya khadirasamidhaṃ śūdrasya apāmārgasamidhaṃ tadanyairvā yathālabdhaiḥ rājyahomānte kuryāt |
661:175: aṣṭasahasraṃ ghṛtāhutīnāṃ aṣṭasahasraṃ ante ca tasyāṃ tadeva bhasmaṃ kṣipet |
661:177: duṣṭacitta āgacchati vā uṣṇīṣacakravarttī ekākṣaramudraṃ badhvā kṣipet |
661:182: etāni vā parāṇi ca yatheṣṭāni karmāṇi bhavanti |
661:188: akṣiṇī mukhaṃ ca sarvataḥ kṛtvā kruddhasya mukhaṃ nirīkṣayet |
661:190: saumyaśca puṣpaphalaṃ anyaṃ vā yatkiñcitsagandhaṃ saptābhimantri kṛtvā rājño nivedayet |
661:192: anyo vā yaḥ kaścit sattvaḥ sa darśanamātreṇaiva vaśyo bhavati |
661:196: anāthe patite klībe vratine ceha śāsane ||
661:198: strīṣu karma na kuryād vai bālavṛddhe tathāture ||
661:200: na kuryāt karmamevaṃ tu mahāsattve prayojayet ||
661:202: atimānine pracaṇḍe ca kuryāt karma īdṛśam ||
661:208: tadeva bhasma kruddho vai yāṃ diśaṃ kṣipate japī ||
661:211: mahāmāryopasargaṃ ca tasmiṃ deśe tu dṛśyate |
661:212: na kuryāt karma evaṃ tu sa kṛcchrapatito'pi hi ||
661:214: yāvat tatkarmaṇā pūrṇe dvisaptāhā tu saṃharet ||
661:216: tṛsaptāhe tathā mṛtyuḥ tasmāt taṃ parivarjayet ||
661:218: trisaptāhe tathā nāśaṃ na kuryāt karma īdṛśam ||
661:220: na bhṛśaṃ sampadaṃ hyete buddhā te śuddhamānasāḥ ||
661:226: śaktaṃ śubhodayaṃ nityaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāsya śubhapradam ||
661:227: vyatimiśraṃ tathā karmaṃ vyatimiśraṃ tu paṭhyate |
661:229: tāṃ jāpī varjayet kṛṣṇaṃ vyatimiśraṃ karma eva vā |
661:231: prāṇoparidhānnarakaṃ tu jāpī yāti punaḥ punaḥ |
661:233: svarga tathā siddhiḥ mantrāṇāṃ ca śubhā gatiḥ |
661:237: mantrā tasya siddhyante jāpinasya śubhe sthite |
661:241: yatheṣṭaṃ sahasrakarmaṃ tu sādhikāṣṭhaṃ ca siddhyate |
661:242: kṣudrakarma prakurvīta uttamaṃ tu na labhyate ||
661:246: utkṛṣṭarūpī tapasvī ca labhate uttamaṃ tathā ||
